Object.Name: PAN Interface
Object.Description1: The PAN (Personal Area Network) Interface Object is a generic Composite Object that can be used for modelling multiple PAN interfaces of either an endpoint or a gateway.

Item.Name: Type
Item.Description: specifies the kind of PAN this interface represents, such as BLE, Zigbee, Classic Bluetooth and so on

Item.Name: PAN Address
Item.Description: The PAN address for this type

Item.Name: Peer Address
Item.Description: For an endpoint, this resoource would represent the gatewayâ€™s PAN address as well as the LWM2M Endpoint ID supplied by the Server, while for a gateway, multiple instances of the Peer Address Resource would represent man- aged end-points.

Item.Name: Peer Endpoint ID
Item.Description: LWM2M Endpoint ID(s) associated with the Peer Address(es)

Item.Name: Low Power Interface
Item.Description: In the case of a BLE-based endpoint, multiple instances of the Low Power Interface Resource would be linked to multiple instances of the BLE GATT Object, with each BLE GATT Object representing a single BLE service.
